name: Salkantay / Inca Trail Trek 6D / 5N
description: This challenging Trek combines the stunning Salkantay trek with the world famous Inca Trail Trek. Walk in the shadow of Salkantay, "The Savage", and experience the unique cultural and historical sites and breathtaking natural beauty of the Inca Trail. This is a great oppurtunity for you to experience two of the most popular treks in the Cusco region!
